      • normalizedJulian

        protected static final float normalizedJulian(float JD)
        暂时不用
        参数:
        JD -
        返回:

      • toDate

        public static final Date toDate(float JD)
        浮点值转换成日期格式
        暂时不用 Returns the Date from a julian. The Julian date will be converted to noon GMT, such that it matches the nearest half-Long (i.e., a julian date of 1.4 gets changed to 1.5, and 0.9 gets changed to 0.5.)
        参数:
        JD - the Julian date
        返回:
        the Gregorian date

      • daysBetween

        public static final int daysBetween(Date early,
                                    Date later)
        Returns the days between two dates. Positive values indicate that the second date is after the first, and negative values indicate, well, the opposite. Relying on specific times is problematic.
        参数:
        early - the "first date"
        later - the "second date"
        返回:
        the days between the two dates

      • daysBetween

        public static final int daysBetween(Calendar early,
                                    Calendar later)
        Returns the days between two dates. Positive values indicate that the second date is after the first, and negative values indicate, well, the opposite.
        参数:
        early -
        later -
        返回:
        the days between two dates.

      • toJulian

        public static final float toJulian(Calendar c)
        Return a Julian date based on the input parameter. This is based from calculations found at Julian Day Calculations (Gregorian Calendar), provided by Bill Jeffrys.
        参数:
        c - a calendar instance
        返回:
        the julian day number

      • toJulian

        public static final float toJulian(Date date)
        暂时不用 Return a Julian date based on the input parameter. This is based from calculations found at Julian Day Calculations (Gregorian Calendar), provided by Bill Jeffrys.
        参数:
        date -
        返回:
        the julian day number

        public static final String dateIncrease(String isoString,
                                        String fmt,
                                        int field,
                                        int amount)
        日期增加
        参数:
        isoString - 日期字符串
        fmt - 格式
        field - 年/月/日 Calendar.YEAR/Calendar.MONTH/Calendar.DATE
        amount - 增加数量
        返回:

      • roll

        public static final String roll(String isoString,
                                String fmt,
                                int field,
                                boolean up)
                         throws ParseException
        Time Field Rolling function. Rolls (up/down) a single unit of time on the given time field.
        参数:
        isoString -
        field - the time field.
        up - Indicates if rolling up or rolling down the field value.
        fmt - use formating char's
        抛出:
        ParseException - if an unknown field value is given.

      • roll

        public static final String roll(String isoString,
                                int field,
                                boolean up)
                         throws ParseException
        Time Field Rolling function. Rolls (up/down) a single unit of time on the given time field.
        参数:
        isoString -
        field - the time field.
        up - Indicates if rolling up or rolling down the field value.
        抛出:
        ParseException - if an unknown field value is given.

      • getDateByOffset

        public Date getDateByOffset(Date date,
                            int calendarField,
                            int offset)
        描述：获取偏移之后的Date.
        参数:
        date - 日期时间
        calendarField - Calendar属性，对应offset的值， 如(Calendar.DATE,表示+offset天,Calendar.HOUR_OF_DAY,表示＋offset小时)
        offset - 偏移(值大于0,表示+,值小于0,表示－)
        返回:
        Date 偏移之后的日期时间

                                       String format,

        calendarField - Calendar属性，对应offset的值， 如(Calendar.DATE,表示+offset天,Calendar.HOUR_OF_DAY,表示＋offset小时)
        offset - 偏移(值大于0,表示+,值小于0,表示－)
        返回:
        String String类型的日期时间

      • isLeapYear

        public static boolean isLeapYear(int year)
        描述：判断是否是闰年()

        (year能被4整除 并且 不能被100整除) 或者 year能被400整除,则该年为闰年.

        参数:
        year - 年代（如2012）
        返回:
        boolean 是否为闰年

        public static String formatDateStr2Desc(String strDate,
                                        String outFormat)
        描述：根据时间返回格式化后的时间的描述. 小于1小时显示多少分钟前 大于1小时显示今天＋实际日期，大于今天全部显示实际时间
        参数:
        strDate - the str date
        outFormat - the out format
        返回:
        the string
